quest.name: Miner Quest
quest.subtitle: Mining Challenge
quest.description: Bust some rocks
quest.offer: So we hear you want to be a miner. A real miner knows how to bust some rocks. Go break some boulders and show us you can handle the job.

quest.name: Miner Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Mining Challenge 2
quest.description: Keep breaking those rocks
quest.offer: You did ok breaking those rocks, now lets see how well you can find ore buried in the ground. That TNT should help you get started.

quest.name: Miner Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Mining Challenge 3
quest.description: Almost done, now make some cobblestone
quest.offer: A miner knows how to work with stone. Cobblestone will provide great protection. Go make us a bunch and show us how its done.

quest.name: Hunter Quest
quest.subtitle: Hunter Challenge
quest.description: Go kill some animals
quest.offer: A real hunter knows how to track and kill his prey. Go show us you have what it takes.

quest.name: Hunter Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Hunter Challenge 2
quest.description: Go kill some animals
quest.offer: You did good rookie, now do it again.

quest.name: Hunter Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Hunter Challenge 3
quest.description: Go kill some animals
quest.offer: So you got some talent. Lets see if you can manage to accomplish this task.

quest.name: Animal Trapping Quest
quest.subtitle: Animal Trapping Challenge
quest.description: Before you can craft an animal snare you're going to need some wood, fiber and some animal feed. Ensure you have everything before moving on.
quest.offer: Follow these steps to learn how to craft animal snares and chicken coops.

quest.name: Animal Trapping Quest 2/4
quest.subtitle: Animal Trapping Challenge
quest.description: Now that you have the required ingredients buid and place your first animal snare. Be sure to place your snare outdoors with sunlight and grass to ensure you catch a critter!

quest.name: Animal Trapping Quest 3/4
quest.subtitle: Animal Trapping Challenge
quest.description: Good job, you placed your first snare! You're well on your way to being a regular Elmer Fudd! Now come back in a few days to see if catches anything. Next lets craft a chicken coop. Gather the required ingredients.

quest.name: Animal Trapping Quest 4/4
quest.subtitle: Animal Trapping Challenge
quest.description: Great! Chicken coops are handy for catching chikens for either their meat or for chicken nests. Place the chicken coop down outside under the sun to attract a chicken and then break the coop. This will give you some meat from killing the chicken, but you will lose your coop. If you leave the coop alone and return in a few days it will spawn a chicken nest ontop that you can loot for eggs and feathers. As long as you don't destroy the coop this can be a good renewable source of feathers and eggs!

quest.name: Builder Quest
quest.subtitle: Builder Challenge
quest.description: Gather some wood
quest.offer: A builder works with wood, you will get to know it well by the time you are done.

quest.name: Builder Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Builder Challenge 2
quest.description: Gather some wood
quest.offer: You need to live, breathe, sleep wood. Keep cutting those tree's down.

quest.name: Builder Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Builder Challenge 3
quest.description: Gather some wood
quest.offer: A master builder must be one with his materials. Go chop down tree's until you can do it blindfolded

quest.name: Rifleman Quest
quest.subtitle: Rifleman Challenge
quest.description: Snipe some zombies
quest.offer: A single shot is all it takes, show your skill with your rifle and kill some zombies.

quest.name: Rifleman Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Rifleman Challenge 2
quest.description: Snipe some zombies
quest.offer: A true rifleman must know his weapon inside and out. Keep killing zombies until you've mastered your weapon.

quest.name: Rifleman Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Rifleman Challenge 3
quest.description: Snipe some zombies
quest.offer: A master with the rifle shares an unspoken bond. Show your mastery and slaughter some zombies.

quest.name: Gunman Quest
quest.subtitle: Gunman Challenge
quest.description: Waste some zombies
quest.offer: A gunman likes to look his target in the eye....before blowing it out the back of his skull. Prove your skills on some zombies.

quest.name: Gunman Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Gunman Challenge 2
quest.description: Waste some zombies
quest.offer: A true gunman lives for the smell of cordite, don't stop killing those Z's until I tell you.

quest.name: Gunman Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Gunman Challenge 3
quest.description: Waste some zombies
quest.offer: The pistol, an American classic. Everyone should own at least one. Make sure to put yours to good use.

quest.name: Veteran Quest
quest.subtitle: Veteran Challenge
quest.description: Eliminate Zed's
quest.offer: You've survived IED's and MRE's, what are a few zombies?

quest.name: Veteran Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Veteran Challenge 2
quest.description: Eliminate Zed's
quest.offer: The feel of gunning down a mob of zombies with a hail of hot lead, nothing feels better.

quest.name: Veteran Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Veteran Challenge 3
quest.description: Eliminate Zed's
quest.offer: Show those zombie's whose boss, treat em to a lead enema.

quest.name: Survivor Quest
quest.subtitle: Survivor Challenge
quest.description: Thin out some zombies.
quest.offer: A survivor knows how to be silent when needed. Go kill some zombies without being heard.

quest.name: Survivor Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Survivor Challenge 2
quest.description: Thin out some zombies.
quest.offer: You're a pretty decent shot, but can you keep it up?

quest.name: Survivor Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Survivor Challenge 3
quest.description: Thin out some zombies.
quest.offer: Your starting to impress us, this is your last test.

quest.name: Bruiser Quest
quest.subtitle: Bruiser Challenge
quest.description: Bust zombie skulls
quest.offer: Hulk smash...

quest.name: Bruiser Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Bruiser Challenge 2
quest.description: Bust zombie skulls
quest.offer: Break some zombie skulls.

quest.name: Bruiser Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Bruiser Challenge 3
quest.description: Bust zombie skulls
quest.offer: Crack some noggins.

quest.name: Medic Quest
quest.subtitle: Medic Challenge
quest.offer: The apocalypse sucks, medicine is more valuable then gold. Go craft some meds

quest.name: Medic Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Medic Challenge 2
quest.offer: Keeping your wound's clean is very important. Make sure to disinfect.

quest.name: Medic Quest 3/3
quest.subtitle: Medic Challenge 3
quest.offer: First aid kit's will save your life, go craft a ton of em.

quest.name: Holy Matrimony
quest.subtitle: Collectes
quest.description: Hey survivor. This chick I've been trying to get with in our group for months now refuses to put out unless we get 'married' - as if thats even a thing anymore. To make matters worse she won't accept unless she has some fancy ring. Nothing I've tried has been enough her her highness. Find me a diamond ring and I'll make make it worth your while - it'll certaily be worth mine!
quest.offer: Hey survivor. This chick I've been trying to get with in our group for months now refuses to put out unless we get 'married' - as if thats even a thing anymore. To make matters worse she won't accept unless she has some fancy ring. Nothing I've tried has been enough her her highness. Find me a diamond ring and I'll make make it worth your while - it'll certaily be worth mine!

quest.name: Fancy Wallet
quest.subtitle: Fancy Wallet
quest.description: Nothing shows ones worth like a luxurious wallet. Bring me something worthy of holding my cash and I will reward you.
quest.offer: Nothing shows ones worth like a luxurious wallet. Bring me something worthy of holding my cash and I will reward you.

quest.name: Avid Reader
quest.subtitle: Avid Reader
quest.description: Greetings there fellow traveler. In todays hellish world it is a tragic shame and loss that many of the classic novels and stories that have lasted for generations have so quickly and easily been tossed aside - or worse, scrapped for mere paper! Please, should you find any of these timeless treasures send them my way. I will reward you handsomely for your troubles.
quest.offer: Greetings there fellow traveler. In todays hellish world it is a tragic shame and loss that many of the classic novels and stories that have lasted for generations have so quickly and easily been tossed aside - or worse, scrapped for mere paper! Please, should you find any of these timeless treasures send them my way. I will reward you handsomely for your troubles.

quest.name: Avid Reader
quest.subtitle: Avid Reader
quest.description: Gather classic novels from before the outbreak for the avid reader.

quest.name: Avid Reader
quest.subtitle: Avid Reader
quest.description: Gather classic novels from before the outbreak for the avid reader.

quest.name: Avid Reader
quest.subtitle: Avid Reader
quest.description: Gather classic novels from before the outbreak for the avid reader.

quest.name: Avid Reader
quest.subtitle: Avid Reader
quest.description: Gather classic novels from before the outbreak for the avid reader.

quest.name: A Child's Happiness
quest.subtitle: A Child's Happiness
quest.description: Hello. A child came into our group recently who, understandably, is in poor shape since the loss of her parents. If you find anything out there that might help her take her mind off things we'd be greatly appreciate it. We do not have much but we will reward you as best we can.
quest.offer: Hello. A child came into our group recently who, understandably, is in poor shape since the loss of her parents. If you find anything out there that might help her take her mind off things we'd be greatly appreciate it. We do not have much but we will reward you as best we can.

quest.name: A Child's Happiness
quest.subtitle: A Child's Happiness
quest.description: Try to find items that might be suitable for a child.

quest.name: A Child's Happiness
quest.subtitle: A Child's Happiness
quest.description: Try to find items that might be suitable for a child.

quest.name: A Clean Wipe
quest.subtitle: A Clean Wipe
quest.description: Hey traveler. While every trader I come across seems to have plenty of random bits and bobs - the one thing I really miss and want is toilet paper. I am sick of paper cuts and rashes! Please, if you find any out there send it my way.
quest.offer: Hey traveler. While every trader I come across seems to have plenty of random bits and bobs - the one thing I really miss and want is toilet paper. I am sick of paper cuts and rashes! Please, if you find any out there send it my way.

quest.name: Music Lover
quest.subtitle: Music Lover
quest.description: Hello traveler. I recently came across a stash of old cassette tapes but have no way to enjoy them. If you come across any old walkmans out there, send it my way. I'll pay you handsomely!
quest.offer: Hello traveler. I recently came across a stash of old cassette tapes but have no way to enjoy them. If you come across any old walkmans out there, send it my way. I'll pay you handsomely!

quest.name: Planned Parenthood
quest.subtitle: Planned Parenthood
quest.description: Certain members of our group have been getting more roudy than usual lately. We all cope in different ways, I suppose, but the last thing we need is more mouths to feed or a little screamer to draw the bitter's attention. If you find any rubbers out there send it our way and we'll make it worth your while. No used ones, either, smartass!
quest.offer: Certain members of our group have been getting more roudy than usual lately. We all cope in different ways, I suppose, but the last thing we need is more mouths to feed or a little screamer to draw the bitter's attention. If you find any rubbers out there send it our way and we'll make it worth your while. No used ones, either, smartass!

quest.name: American Pasttime
quest.subtitle: American Pasttime
quest.description: Hey there slugger! If you find any autographed baseballs out there send them my way and I'll make it worth your while. Someone has to keep the tradition alive - might as well be me!
quest.offer: Hey there slugger! If you find any autographed baseballs out there send them my way and I'll make it worth your while. Someone has to keep the tradition alive - might as well be me!

quest.name: Texas Hold'Em
quest.subtitle: Texas Hold'Em
quest.description: Howdy survivor. I lost my last good pack of playing cards after a bunch of bitters overran our last camp. I miss them almost as much as our cook. If you come across any on your travels I'd be mighty grateful!
quest.offer: Howdy survivor. I lost my last good pack of playing cards after a bunch of bitters overran our last camp. I miss them almost as much as our cook. If you come across any on your travels I'd be mighty grateful!

quest.name: Cancerous Addiction
quest.subtitle: Cancerous Addiction
quest.description: Listen bud, It won't be a biter that takes me down. If I'm going out, Im going out with my smokes. But its hard to do that when you can't find the bloody things. Please, if you come across a pack in your journey I'll pay you well for it.
quest.offer: Listen bud, It won't be a bitter that takes me down. If I'm going out, Im going out with my smokes. But its hard to do that when you can't find the bloody things. Please, if you come across a pack in your journey I'll pay you well for it.

quest.name: Artistic Integrity
quest.subtitle: Artistic Integrity
quest.description: People just don't understand! I must express myself, how else will I leave my mark on this world? I must capture the struggle of man in todays harsh world through paint! However these savages I'm stuck with don't seem to appreciate the necessity of what I'm trying to do! If you find any art supplies in your adventures I'll pay you well for it.
quest.offer: People just don't understand! I must express myself, how else will I leave my mark on this world? I must capture the struggle of man in todays harsh world through paint! However these savages I'm stuck with don't seem to appreciate the necessity of what I'm trying to do! If you find any art supplies in your adventures I'll pay you well for it.

quest.name: Cleanliness Next to Godliness
quest.subtitle: Cleanliness Next to Godliness
quest.description: Few people seem to understand the importance of staying clean. Just because the world has gone to shit doesn't mean I have to put up with it on my hands. If you find any bars of soap out there I'll reward you well for them.
quest.offer: Few people seem to understand the importance of staying clean. Just because the world has gone to shit doesn't mean I have to put up with it on my hands. If you find any bars of soap out there I'll reward you well for them.

quest.name: Up In Smoke
quest.subtitle: Up In Smoke
quest.description: Hey man. Check it, this jack-off in our group smashed my only bong in a druken rage. If you find one out there in one of your wild journeys could you send it my way? I can sneak you some coins if you do, man.
quest.offer: Hey man. Check it, this jack-off in our group smashed my only bong in a druken rage. If you find one out there in one of your wild journeys could you send it my way? I can sneak you some coins if you do, man.

quest.name: Sticky Pages
quest.subtitle: Collect 10 Tantalizing Magazines
quest.description: Loot through dressers and find 10 'tantalizing' magazines for Sticky-Fingered Pete. Just don't shake his hand after.
quest.offer: Collect 10 Tantalizing Magazines

quest.name: Big Bad Bosses Quest
quest.subtitle: Zombie Boss Challenge
quest.description: Who's the boss now?
quest.offer: Slay three of the zombie bosses.

quest.name: Ankle Bitters Quest
quest.subtitle: Ankle Bitting Challenge
quest.description: Whats that nibbling at your heel?
quest.offer: Slaughter 15 ravager zombies.

quest.name: Light'Em Up
quest.subtitle: Kill 30 zombies with a burning club.
quest.description: Light up a wooden club in a campfire and use it to kill 30 zombies.
quest.offer: Kill 30 zombies with a burning club. You can craft a burning club by right-clicking a campfire with a wooden club.

quest.name: Dog Eat Dog
quest.subtitle: Kill 3 Dogs with Bare Hands.
quest.description: Using nothing but your fists kill three zombie dogs.
quest.offer: Kill 3 zombie dogs bare hand.

quest.name: Feed the Mole
quest.subtitle: Feed the Mole
quest.description: Gather some raw meat and water.
quest.offer: Joel is hungry and needs a day's worth of food. Fetch him some and he might reward you.

quest.name: Taking Notes 1/3
quest.subtitle: Taking Notes
quest.description: Go out and survive by killing some zombies and take note of your experiences.
quest.offer: Kill 10 zombies.

quest.name: Taking Notes 2/3
quest.subtitle: Taking Notes
quest.description: Go out and survive by killing some zombies and take note of your experiences.
quest.offer: Kill 10 zombies.

quest.name: Taking Notes 3/3
quest.subtitle: Taking Notes
quest.description: Go out and survive by killing some zombies and take note of your experiences.
quest.offer: Kill 10 zombies.

quest.name: H0tr0d's Request
quest.subtitle: Gather rotting flesh.
quest.description: Some shady guy who calls himself H0tr0D has an unsual request that you obtain for him rotting flesh. You don't understand his reasoning but he promises a nice reward.
quest.offer: Some shady guy who calls himself H0tr0D has an unsual request that you obtain for him rotting flesh. You don't understand his reasoning but he promises a nice reward.

quest.name: An Aquired Taste
quest.subtitle: An Aquired Taste
quest.description: You're not certain what H0tr0D's mystery meat is made out of... but it sure smells... good...

quest.name: Survivor's Journal 1/2
quest.subtitle: Gather the missing pages
quest.description: You found a page from a survivor's journal that hints at leading to a special stash. If you had the other pieces you might be able to find out more.
quest.offer: You found a page from a survivor's journal that hints at leading to a special stash. If you had the other pieces you might be able to find out more.

quest.name: Survivor's Journal 2/2
quest.subtitle: Find the locked briefase.
quest.description: The journal pages you found gave you a combination and indicated that whoever owned this journal left a prized stash of goods in a suspicious stump. Find the briefase and unlock it with the combination to see what treasure was left behind.

quest.name: Breaking and Enterng
quest.subtitle: Crack the lock on three gun safes.
quest.description: Using the lockpicks given to you go break into three locked gunsafes.
quest.offer: Using the lockpicks given to you go break into three locked gunsafes

quest.name: Breaking and Enterng
quest.subtitle: Crack the lock on three gun safes.
quest.description: Using the lockpicks given to you go break into three locked gunsafes.

quest.name: Jock Hunt
quest.subtitle: Jock Hunt
quest.description: Search football stadiums to find and kill 5 football jocks.
quest.offer: Find and kill 5 football jocks.

quest.name: Don't Fear the Reaper
quest.subtitle: Don't Fear the Reaper
quest.description: Rumor tells of a lethal zombie that lurks in graveyards. Lets see if there is any truth to those rumors.
quest.offer: Find and kill a reaper.

quest.name: Walmart Shoppers
quest.subtitle: Walmart Shoppers
quest.description: Find and kill three fat male and female zombies.
quest.offer: Kill 6 Fat Zombies.

quest.name: Kickz' Quest 1/2
quest.subtitle: Kickz Challenge
quest.description: Fleet of Foot
quest.offer: The slow have no place in this world. Get a pair of 'Kickz' (tm) sports shoes for extra fast looting runs.

quest.name: Kickz' Quest 2/3
quest.subtitle: Off to the races
quest.description: Well, see if they fit, already.
quest.offer: Baby got new shoes.

quest.name: Kickz' Quest 2/2
quest.subtitle: Chemical Boosts
quest.description: Sometimes even the best athletes need a little chemical boost. Gather some potassium, painkillers, mushrooms and goldenrod to get a special drug.

quest.name: Loki's Hints 1/4
quest.subtitle: Survival Challenge 1
quest.description: Good clean water is the key to staying hydrated. The first step is filtration. First make some charcoal in a campfire, then collect some sand, plant fibers and a bottle of murky water.
quest.offer: Follow Loki's guide to learn how to craft unique items to improve your odds of survival.

quest.name: Loki's Hints 2/4
quest.subtitle: Make a laminated bow
quest.description: A simple wood bow will break easily. Gather some glue to laminate strips of wood and rawhide for the bowstring and your bow will be more durable.
quest.offer: laminated bows

quest.name: Loki's Hints 3/4
quest.subtitle: Chemical Headshots
quest.description: Better living through Chemistry: Give zombies a dose of their own medicine. Gather some zombie flesh, cook it up in a beaker to make a nasty alternative ammo for your shotgun.
quest.offer: zombie smoke beacon

quest.name: Loki's Hints 4/4
quest.subtitle: Feast after Famine
quest.description: Good food is hard to come by, in today's world. But with a little effort you can prepare healthy and tasty meals. First cut up some vegetables (corn or potatos), by 'scrapping' them . . .

quest.name: Dismantle 9MM Bullets
quest.subtitle: Dismantle 9MM Bullets
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Dismantle 44Mag Bullets
quest.subtitle: Dismantle 44Mag Bullets
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Dismantle 762MM Bullets
quest.subtitle: Dismantle 762MM Bullets
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Dismantle Shotgun Shells
quest.subtitle: Dismantle Shotgun Shells
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Dismantle 9MM Bullets
quest.subtitle: Dismantle 9MM Bullets
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Dismantle 44Mag Bullets
quest.subtitle: Dismantle 44Mag Bullets
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Dismantle 762MM Bullets
quest.subtitle: Dismantle 762MM Bullets
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Dismantle Shotgun Shells
quest.subtitle: Dismantle Shotgun Shells
quest.description: Dismantle your ammo to get their raw components.
quest.offer: You've dismantled some ammo for its raw materials.

quest.name: Ammo Supply
quest.subtitle: Ammo Supply
quest.description: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.
quest.offer: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.

quest.name: Ammo Supply
quest.subtitle: Ammo Supply
quest.description: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.
quest.offer: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.

quest.name: Ammo Supply
quest.subtitle: Ammo Supply
quest.description: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.
quest.offer: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.

quest.name: Ammo Supply
quest.subtitle: Ammo Supply
quest.description: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.
quest.offer: Open this to get some ammo for your gun.

quest.name: Survivor Experience
quest.subtitle: Survivor Experience
quest.offer: This crumbled, bloodied note from a survivor might give you a little insight on surviving in this harsh world. Or at least teach you how not to end up like one who left the note...
quest.description: Your experience surviving in this harsh world has given you a skill point.

quest.name: Survivor Experience
quest.subtitle: Survivor Experience
quest.offer: This is a collection of survivor notes which might give you a little insight on surviving in this harsh world.
quest.description: Your experience surviving in this harsh world has given you 5 skill points.

quest.name: Hunter Skills
quest.subtitle: Hunter Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: Hunter's are trained in tracking down animals.

quest.name: Rifleman Skills
quest.subtitle: Rifleman Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: Rifleman's are trained in using rifles.

quest.name: Veteran Skills
quest.subtitle: Veteran Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: Veterans have past military experience.

quest.name: Survivor Skills
quest.subtitle: Survivor Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: Survivor's specialize in surviving off the land.

quest.name: Gunman Skills
quest.subtitle: Gunman Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: Gunman have experience with handguns.

quest.name: Medic Skills
quest.subtitle: Medic Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: The field medic has previous military training on the field and knows how to handle a handgun and an injury.

quest.name: Bruiser Skills
quest.subtitle: Bruiser Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: The Bruiser has experience in getting rough and prefers to get up close and personal in combat.

quest.name: Builder Skills
quest.subtitle: Builder Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: Buildlers are skilled at crafting and building.

quest.name: Miner Skills
quest.subtitle: Miner Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: Miners are skilled with working with stone and a forge.

quest.name: Wildcard Skills
quest.subtitle: Wildcard Skills
quest.description: This teaches you the skills of the class.
quest.offer: The Wildcard class can be custom tailored to match your preferences.
